entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
